idea: SkillWorldSkillworld is focussed on creating employability amongst the youth of the country. There is a very large population in the job seeking age group. Our approach is to provide online training on job ready skills and then connect them with the corporates for freelancing assignments. Thus youth gain knowledge as weel as experience and will become a preferred choice of employers. We also provide a platform for self employment where they can continue to do assignments and earn money.
name: SKILLWORLD NETWORK PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: One of the biggest problem of Doctors in India to stored Medical Data electronically and its really time consuming for doctors to input Medical data in EMR System so we have created Bluetooth connected Digital pen for doctors so doctors can write on normal prescription so automatically synchronous with mobile application of doctors ,patients as well as Pharmaceutical companies .we are also planning to used Blockchian technology for solving the issue of Interoperability between Different Healthcare stakeholders.
name: DigiDoc

idea:
Pahal’s Pride provide chauffeur driven cars on rent, whether it’s economy class, executive class or luxury class. Cars are available for point to point travel, for multi-point travel, for special events, for contractual basis, etc. They are also made available for local or outstation movement.
We also provide bus on hire, whether it’s mini bus or bus with high capacity. Buses are available for one day tour or on contract basis whether it’s for school, tour package, regular transportation, etc.
Not only for people movement, but we also help you for your goods & cargo movement by providing you with goods carrier whether it’s 0.5 ton capacity or in multi tonnage capacity. But, trucking solution is only available on contract. Where managing drivers and vehicles is on us.
So it’s Car, Bus or Truck; remember Pahal’s Pride..
name: PAHAL CAR & BUS RENTAL LLP
ENABLE INNOVATIVE TECHNOLOGY & ENGINEERING SERVICES LIMITED LIABILITY PARTNERSHIP

idea: SOHO Space is redefining the way work is done in the world. SOHO space will partner with leading Restaurants and Cafes in the town to convert them as creative spaces for work and meetings during their off-hours. SOHO is the latest style of co-working, fusion of traditional co-working and working out from cafés. The motive is to help SOHO members fall in love with their work and help restaurants (or Cafés) to maximize their ROI with efficient use of their resources.
name: SOHO Space

idea: Healthcare Digitization: Patient engagement and clinic management for Hospitals & Doctors
name: Doctin for doctors

name: GHANSHYAM GOKULBHAI CHANDAT
